No. 5411)} Sub: Duties & Responsibilities of the Reservation Celll Liaison Officers -reg: In order to ensure the compliance of instructions on reservation in service issued by Government of India from time to time for SC/ST/OBC/ PwBD/EWS/Ex-Serviceman, with the approval of the Competent Authority, a Reservation Cell comprising Liaison Officers for different categories has been constituted in NHAI from time to time. 2 The duties & responsibilities of the Liaison Officers are prescribed in DoPT OM No.DOPT-1670494514912 dated 08.12.2022 (copy enclosed) and other related instructions issued by the Central Government from time to time_ 3 In addition to this, it has been decided that the respective Liaison Officers shall append their signatures on Reservation Rosters prepared by Administration Division as a token of their inspection. Thereafter , the Reservation Rosters shall also be signed by the concerned officers handling the cadre and GM (Admn:) concerned handling the cadre. Further , any instruction issued by the Central Government in this regard shall be applicable mutatis mutandis to Reservation Cell/Liaison Officers. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
